nationalist background
um writers have to be exposed to the

Outlook I took out of my house um the

in terms of what's going

um so I I had to
uh separate whatever political Ambitions
I
had and commit to something and once I

have my political sensibilities but when

don't think about it from that

story
um I want people to read it and love the

that's the primary thing for me
everything after that I mean if you
convert over to my side of politics
great beautiful but all the

were always great stories first they
were great stories before anything I
think ideology kills art I think it
kills writing all the time I think it
just completely completely destroys it
um so I I really had to make a choice
and my choice was to tell stories and
once I decided that that that was what I
was going to do the whole idea of being

side anything like that that was going

as they actually

this is a terrible book this is an awful
